etymology.description: 熟(熟) (shú, "mature; ripe") and 女(女) (nǚ, "woman") combine to form 熟女(熟女) (shúnǚ, "stylish mature woman").
etymology.interpretation: The term 熟女(熟女) (shúnǚ) refers to a woman who is mature, both in age and demeanor, suggesting she may be sophisticated and stylish. This reflects a social recognition of the grace and confidence often attributed to women who have embraced their maturity.

examples.chinese: 那位熟女穿着时尚(那位熟女穿著時尚)。
examples.english: That stylish mature woman is dressed fashionably.

examples.chinese: 熟女走在街上(熟女走在街上)，吸引了许多目光(吸引了許多目光)。
examples.pinyin: Shúnǚ zǒu zài jiē shàng, xīyǐnle xǔduō mùguāng.
examples.english: The stylish mature woman walked on the street, attracting many glances.

examples.chinese: 熟女不仅具有成熟魅力(熟女不僅具有成熟魅力)，而且精通生活艺术(而且精通生活藝術)。
examples.pinyin: Shúnǚ bùjǐn jùyǒu chéngshú mèilì, érqiě jīngtōng shēnghuó yìshù.
examples.english: A stylish mature woman not only possesses a mature charm, but also masters the art of living.
